title: admin-extra does not appear on new UI on 5.4.1
description:
admin-extra.html and the corresponding {{admin-extra.menu}}s don't appear in the new Angular UI.

I haven't tested or poked around much, but I have a few items in those HTML files.  They appear on the old UI, but not the new UI.

comments.author: Alexandre Rafalovitch
comments.content: This is deliberate (so far) and the primary JIRA to discuss this is SOLR-8140

comments.author: Nat Taylor
comments.content: I'm going to close as a duplicate.
